about_the_game:
Adventure Allies" is a casual action-adventure game where you can adventure with monsters and enjoy combat, exploration, and training.

Set out on an adventure to an unknown island

Players set out on an adventure from their base to an unknown island. Explore freely in search of monsters, items, and treasure!
After 10 minutes of adventure, the dreaded night will arrive. Get off the island as soon as possible.

Join the monsters

Monsters appear here and there on the island. Each monster has unique stats and unique skills.
When a monster is given a certain amount of Tame Energy, it becomes a temporary companion.
If you succeed in bringing the monster back from the escape point, it becomes a full member of the group.
Let's collect various monsters!

Synthesis

Monsters can be synthesized to inherit each other's status.
Breed the strongest monster you can find!

Materials and Shop

You can obtain various materials from monsters and ores during your adventures.
Exchange them for items at the stores located at your base and use them to help you conquer your adventures.

Equipment

Equipment can be purchased in stores or obtained from monster drops.
Players and monsters have equipment slots like a puzzle.
Equipment comes in different shapes, so think about what and where you want to place it.

The arena

Take on the arena where powerful NPCs await you along with monsters.
Winning the arena will give you special items and monsters.
Aim to conquer the arena!

Big coins and treasures

Large coins and treasures may be found in the field.
Large coins have special effects depending on the number of coins collected.
Treasures have the effect of increasing the player's status.

Communication

Invite your Steam friends to adventure with you.
Up to two people can play together.

Videos and Streaming

The game can be freely distributed on video distribution sites such as YouTube and Twitch.
There are no restrictions on monetization. No prior or post contact is required.
There are no restrictions on posting on social networking sites.
We would appreciate it if you could include the name of the game or the URL of the Steam page in your video or distribution.
